contract.title: Service Contract
contract.services: We provide comprehensive educational consultation services for applications to Turkish universities. Our services include guidance on university selection, application document preparation, visa assistance, and ongoing support throughout the admission process.
contract.payment: Payment terms and refund policies are discussed individually with each client based on the specific services required. We offer transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Detailed terms are provided upon consultation.
contract.contact: For questions regarding our service contract, terms of service, or to discuss your specific needs, please contact us at edu.turkish2018{'@'}gmail.com or reach out through our official communication channels.
